types.name: Calacatta
types.description: Luxurious white marble with bold, dramatic veining. Commonly used in high-end interiors and feature walls.
applications: Luxury flooring for villas and hotels
Premium bathroom slabs and shower walls

types.name: Statuario
types.description: Bright white marble with thick, elegant grey veins. Known for its premium look and luxurious appeal.
applications: Hotel lobbies and high-class commercial interiors

types.name: Volakas
types.description: Greek marble with soft linear grey veins. Popular for floors, walls, and modern interior designs.

types.name: Carrara
types.description: Classic Italian marble with subtle, fine grey veining. A timeless option for both residential and commercial spaces.

types.name: Emperador
types.description: Rich brown marble with white and light brown veining. Ideal for luxury floor and wall applications.
applications: Lobby flooring and hotel reception desks

types.name: Travertine
types.description: Natural warm-toned stone with unique textures and patterns. Often used in bathrooms, outdoor areas, and rustic designs.

types.name: Onyx
types.description: Semi-precious translucent stone known for its dramatic colors and veining. Perfect for backlit walls and luxury interiors.
